    GraphQL - A Practical Overview and Hands-On Tutorial

    Umer Mansoor Follow Oct 13, 2019 · 1 min read

    GraphQL is a Query Language for APIs. It provides a fresh and modern approach to fetching (and manipulating) data from APIs when compared to traditional methods such as REST. Its power comes from the ability to let clients talk to a single endpoint and specify exactly what data they need. That’s very powerful indeed.

    This is a sample blog. Read more at CodeAhoy.com
